page.title: 02EDUCATION
page.content: The only school in the area is a Primary School which has a roll of 31 children.They begin school at about five years old and spend seven years in Primary before transferring to Secondary Education. The roll has fallen sharply in the last 10 years. The school used to have three teachers but now has only two - the headteacher and an assistant. The schoolhouse is no longer lived in but is used as staffroom and bookstore. Five of the children are transported to and from school by taxi as there is no bus service on their roads and all of them live more than two miles from school. All the others walk or cycle to school or come by private car.
